entry.title: We're all about leveling up! This is a pretty exciting update from our S1 partners @ConsenSys
entry.summary: We're all about leveling up! This is a pretty exciting update from our S1 partners @ConsenSys ConsenSys Diligence: Today we published the Diligence Security Tooling Guide to help devs across Web3 level up their smart contract security! 🥳🚀 The guide features 22 tools from @GnosisDAO @trufflesuite @OpenZeppelin @TenderlyApp and more, and when to use each at every stage of development.👇
